headline.summary: Developer & Business Analyst · Dedicated to interdisciplinary perspectives on information retrieval and knowledge transfer · Skilled in structuring data and content for humans and machines

job.title: Developer & Business Analyst
job.summary: Creating data & information architecture · Performing requirements engineering · Evaluating data and systems  · Making data visualizations · Developing prototype and production web sites, web applications, and web services

job.title: Frontend Developer
job.summary: Developed the user interface and custom data visualizations for a pREDi/NRD drug discovery project's data exploration website · Developed custom features to group, sort, and share box plots, heat maps, line charts, and spider plots · Integrated data export of explored data · Implemented single sign-on user flow

job.title: Tool Coordinator and Developer
job.summary: Developed frontend components and data visualizations for individual scientific edition projects in inseri · Developed two backend microservices for the inseri infrastructure · Developed import scripts for the migration of original project data to the inseri infrastructure · Mediated needs between scientific edition projects and software architecture · Developed e-editiones for sharing Humanities ontologies in human- and machine-readable formats

job.title: Co-Initiator
job.summary: unscrunch was an interdisciplinary digital agency based in Basel with a strong focus on structured data, relevant content, digital transformation, and innovative online solutions.

job.title: Strategic Competence Lead
job.summary: Developed Karger’s strategic competences in advanced technologies · Established knowledge transfer of complex solutions · Built support vector machine based on PubMed data to classify scientific articles by article type · Assessed internal opportunities as well as external partners regarding data science, artificial intelligence, and blockchain

job.title: Head of Marketing Online & Databases
job.summary: Improved production and distribution workflows adhering to bibliographic, content, and metadata standards · Managed a team of four staff members, recruited three positions · Enhanced data quality and integrity using external data sources · Established GDPR compliance of direct marketing data

job.title: eContent & ePartner
job.summary: Led workflow and data conversion from Karger's own SGML standard to the Journal Article Tag Suite (JATS) XML in order to have web-ready source data · Streamlined development and maintenance of all publications-related content and metadata standards as well as data distributions

job.title: Scientific Proofreader
job.summary: Arranged scientific articles to ensure readability, correctness, and consistency of content (text, figures, tables), grammar, spelling, and punctuation

job.title: Project Associate
job.summary: Conducted requirements engineering and wrote project documentation for a bi-temporal database application · Initiated graphical user interface prototypes · Organized automated GUI tests · Developed and performed usability tests and training sessions with end users

job.title: Scientific Associate
job.summary: Planned field work for soil sciences part in interdisciplinary SNF project · Wrote scientific paper based on own Master's thesis results
